title: Need someone to build a wordpress membership site
snippet:
In January 2017 I'm launching an online yoga membership site. I'm using moonclerk.com to collect recurring payments. You can view my sales page here: http://bit.ly/lunaryoga

I'm not at all familiar with wordpress so I would like someone to make me a simple video based subscription website, preferably that can accept affiliates.

Since I'm accepting payments through Moonclerk.com I don't need the website to process payments but it will need to somehow prompt users to create a username and password in order to access the videos. I already own the domain and have a host. I have not decided on a membership plugin and leave that up to you to decide the one that will work best keeping in mind that my content is almost all video based.
